Scope: ${ScopeLevel}

Click the link to view the the full details:
${URL}

data.name: Admin_HistoryChangeset
data.value:
This page lists all the changes that were made in the selected product. To view the details and optionally restore or purge a specific changeset artifact, click the changeset ID number.
To revert multiple items at once, select the checkboxes and then click the "Revert" button. If you select multiple changesets for a single artifact, changes will be rolled back to the earliest changeset. You cannot roll back an Added, Purged, or Rollback changeset.
